topic.title: Migrating Data with gpcopy
topic.shortdesc: You can use the gpcopy utility to transfer data between databases in different Cloudberry Database clusters.

body.note: gpcopy is available only with the commercial release of VMware Tanzu Cloudberry.
body.p: gpcopy is a high-performance utility that can copy metadata and data from one Cloudberry database to another Cloudberry database. You can migrate the entire contents of a database, or just selected tables. The clusters can have different Cloudberry Database versions. For example, you can use gpcopy to migrate data from a Cloudberry Database version 4.3.26 (or later) system to a 5.9 (or later) or a 6.x Cloudberry system, or from a Cloudberry Database version 5.9+ system to a Cloudberry 6.x system.
body.note: The gpcopy utility is available as a separate download for the commercial release of Tanzu Cloudberry. See the Tanzu Cloudberry Data Copy Utility Documentation.
